casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Antwan L. ASH. No. 528P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Barbara S. Blackman, Durham, for Ash. Melissa L. Trippe, Special Deputy Attorney General, Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 668 S.E.2d 65 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 1st day of December 2008 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of February 2009."
